quote: That's the thing about a great book. Every time you read it, it's different, because you're different. You've changed since the last time you picked it up, things have happened to you.
quote_letters: THATS THE THING ABOUT A GREAT BOOK EVERY TIME YOU READ IT ITS DIFFERENT BECAUSE YOURE DIFFERENT YOUVE CHANGED SINCE THE LAST TIME YOU PICKED IT UP THINGS HAVE HAPPENED TO YOU
